entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
